front.title: OSPF Extensions for Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSON) with Impairments

abstract.t: This document specifies OSPF extensions to carry information aboutphysical impairments. This information set is required for thefeasibility assessment of the lightpath to be established across anoptical switched network controlled by GMPLS.The document intent is both disseminating experimental resultscarried out within Ericsson Research and provide an initial input forfurther OSPF extensions in CCAMP IETF group.
